name: Crypto Legions Bloodstone v3
description: Crypto Legions is a cutting edge Play-To-Earn NFT game on the BSC network. Bloodstone is the native utility token that's used for: Minting in-game NFTs, Receiving game rewards, Purchasing hunting supplies in order to complete missions, Buying NFTs off other users from the in game marketplace. What makes Crypto Legions unique? 1. Play Forever Earn Forever, 2. Transparent Economy Status, 3. Smart Claim System, 4. In-game Referral System, 5. We Prove We Care, 6. The Reserve Pool, 7. Reincarnation, 8. A Record Breaking Game.
